response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, holds immense value for you, estimated at $800,000. I am offering you the chance to own this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer not only presents a fantastic investment opportunity but also ensures that you secure a piece that aligns perfectly with your goals and aspirations.

Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you would like to proceed with the purchase. I am here to assist you throughout the process and answer any questions you might have.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
